unnormalised: Okay, so I've been digging into this whole "Adaptive Learning" thing in EdTech, and honestly, it's pretty darn cool. Think of it like your own personalized tutoring system, but online!

unnormalised: Basically, imagine a learning platform that figures out what you *actually* know, not just what you *should* know. If Priya from my IIT-Bombay batch breezes through the algebra sections, the system will automatically bump her up to harder stuff. Meanwhile, if Rohan from Delhi is struggling with fractions, he gets extra practice problems and explanations tailored to his level.
